mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BOARD (CUST_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_MEMBERS, BOARD_PERIOD, BOARD_DEADLINE, BOARD_OPENTALK, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_VIEWS, BOARD_POSITION, PRO_TITLE, PRO_LINK, PRO_IMG) VALUES (#{CUST_ID},#{BOARD_TITLE},#{BOARD_MEMBERS},#{BOARD_PERIOD},#{BOARD_DEADLINE},#{BOARD_OPENTALK},#{BOARD_CONTENT}, #{BOARD_VIEWS},#{BOARD_POSITION},#{PRO_TITLE},#{PRO_LINK},#{PRO_IMG});
